title: So this is what im dealing with trying to rank up..

replies.body:
Nasus is an extremely selfish pick especially if it is coming from someone who knows how to Nasus. Against a good Nasus you have to go top lane and deal with him yourself, because a lot of bad players don't understand how to deny him really, and get ahead. 

Btw your cs was not so hot, if you could cs better you would have probably won. It would have also helped if you didn't verbally abuse team mates or get salty at them.

Oh no! some people are having bad games while trying to improve in a competitive environment! 
GG noob team, GG report x for feeding, Uninstall scrublords. 
In all seriousness, they were trying. It just looks like they were outplayed. A couple of them were even playing roles that they didn't main and in that aspect, were somewhat disadvantaged against their opponents.
